After School App | San Francisco | Controversial Social App for Teens

We are After School App and we want to hire you! (Engineering needs in iOS, Android and Backend PHP).

Our 5 person team supports millions of users across the US. With our recent success and Series A funding we are building out our engineering team to crank out more cool stuff for our users. We are located on Market St in Downtown SF.

1. You are the expert …. we want to know what you think

2. Early stage options … only 5 people now!!!!

3. Down to earth founders …. from experience I can’t stress how important that is ;D

Here is some food for thought…. current high schoolers don’t care about Facebook (they were barely born when it came out) they need some new way to communicate and keep their privacy… we can do both while giving them fun tools to use in order to make new friends, learn and grow.

Check out some of the recent features we added to help our users. http://www.dailydot.com/technology/after-school-comeback/

If you have any questions or do find our idea interesting please email me Dmitry@AfterSchoolApp.com.
